content.html: Eddie Izzard is, perhaps, not a biological woman. If Eddie Izzard feels that she wants to be seen as a woman then why not go beyond simply tolerating that and give her our love and support? Try it. It’ll feel ok. Not as scary as you thought?
content.value:
Eddie Izzard is, perhaps, not a biological woman.

If Eddie Izzard feels that she wants to be seen as a woman then why not go beyond simply tolerating that and give her our love and support?

Try it. It’ll feel ok. Not as scary as you thought?
